ComicInfo.Title: Dios Mio!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Why is a nun barging into a seedy Tokyo karaoke bar in the middle of the night to find a sleazy naked man smoking meth? Because that man is Jesus, and Sister Maria needs him to help her and Satan stop humanity's mythological gods from f***ing up the earth.
Back up feature:* Holy F*ck Origins: 33 AD*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Daniël Arruda Massa | 1 | B | Cover B | Daniël Arruda Massa | 2 | C | Cover C | Daniël Arruda Massa | 3 | RE | AOD Exclusive Cover | Dan Mendoza | 4 | RE | Comic-Con Exclusive Cover, Limited to 100 | Aaron Conley | 5 | *Release dates:* Digital Edition - 11/3/2014Print Edition - 1/21/2015
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-28 19:39:45. [CVDB469619]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Aaron Conley, Dan Mendoza, Daniël Arruda Massa
ComicInfo.Characters: Ganesha, Isis, Jesus Christ, Quetzalcoatl, Ra, Satan, Sister Maria, Zeus
